metadata.min_stack_comments: Multiple field support in the New Terms rule type was added in Elastic 8.6

author: Elastic
rule.description:
A sudoers file specifies the commands that users or groups can run and from which terminals. Adversaries can take
advantage of these configurations to execute commands as other users or spawn processes with higher privileges.
rule.name: Sudoers File Modification
rule.query: event.category:file and event.type:change and file.path:(/etc/sudoers* or /private/etc/sudoers*)
